\"space\" will assign (or unassign) your: "空間" 將分配（或取消）自己的卡片。
\"v\" will add (or remove) your vote on: "v" 將增加（或刪除）您的投票卡上。

A board is a collection of cards ordered: 阿板是在列表的列表排序卡的集合。用它來管理項目，跟踪收集，或組織什麼。
A board is a collection of cards ordered in a list of lists. You can import board from Asana, Github, Kantree.io, Pipefy, Taiga, Taskwarrior, Trello and Wekan
About data protection and privacy for al: About data protection and privacy for all individuals within the European Union
Access your Restyaboard notifications th: 通過亞馬遜迴聲訪問Restyaboard通知。這Restyaboard Alexa的技能使用AWS開發LAMBDA。您需要登錄亞馬遜Alexa的Android應用程序，以Restyaboard。
Added the feature 'Card template app' wh: Added the feature 'Card template app' which allows the users to create a template with necessary details like members, labels and description. Further, it offers the possibility to use the same for any other card which demands the same information.
Adds Custom Field for handling projects.
增加了對處理項目的甘特圖。
Adds Report view for handling projects.
Adds charts with summary in dashboard, f: 添加圖表與儀表板綜上所述，對於今天托多斯等容易過濾
Adds easy filtering of cards. Useful whe: 添加的卡容易過濾。有用的，當你有多個板
Adds estimated time tracking option for: 會為每個卡估計的時間跟踪選項。
Adds option to setup ready-made text com: 添加選項卡設置現成的文本註釋。
Adds ready to use checklist template for: 添加準備使用清單模板網站上進行QA。
Adds ready to use template SEO checklist: 添加準備使用模板的SEO清單模板進行搜索引擎優化。

All actions will be removed from the act: 所有操作都將在活動饋送被刪除，您將無法重新打開該卡。沒有撤消。您可以存檔卡從主板上取下並保留活動。
All the list view fields are hidden by l: All the list view fields are hidden by list view configuration, you can configure in %s
All upcoming Restyaboard versions will b: All upcoming Restyaboard versions will be codenamed after legendary music bands, as a token of respect and appreciation and default board background will be changed to respective band's wallpaper.
Allows users to add card quickly across: 允許用戶快速增加卡片跨板 - 無需打開板。
Allows users to print list name and card: Allows users to print list name and card title on sticky sheets.
